actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of a compilation of materials entitled "Guide to Research Collections of Former United States Senators, 1789-1982", as a Senate Document.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing as a Senate document of a compilation of materials prepared by the Senate Historical Office entitled "Guide to Research Collections of Former United States Senators, 1789-1982."

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of a compilation of materials entitled "Guide to Research Collections of Former United States Senators, 1789-1982", as a Senate Document.
